column4: I'm trying to follow a forum topic at http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=120615 and I got to the part where I'm supposed to 'make depend && make' in the installation, however make pukes up with an error shown at http://pastebin.com/m3ff648ac . Any ideas on what I should try and do to let make go on?
I... so forgot to check the date... Thank you.
once you install wine from the repos start at the "winecfg" line in that tutorial
cause from slightly looking at it, the instructions after that (the few) are what I do when trying to get wow working, it's worked really easily for me recently at least :) good luck
you've already run a "make install" command>
oh. No. Duh, I was just compiling it. -slaps face- Thank you...
do you mean zombie processes that list as "Z" in a ps command?
as in system>admin>system monitor lists them as zombie
ps will list processes, once you see the zombie one you can just type "kill <pid>" to kill it, if that doesn't work you can try "kill -9 <pid>" or "sudo kill <pid>" and "sudo kill -9 <pid"
if it's an actual zombie process according to the kernel (with a Z flag in the ps output) you might not be able to kill it
the first time i did that it just spit out a help file mabob...
does ps list it as a zombie? Z in the status columb?
http://www.linuxsa.org.au/tips/zombies.html you can probably log out and log back in to clear it, but kill and sudo kill and sudo kill -9 might not do it
